attributes.action: Say NO to increased tolls at the Dartford Crossing
attributes.additional_details:
Freeze toll charges on the Dartford Crossing. Conduct a full, open and truly comprehensive consultation that fully takes into account the needs of south Essex, north Kent and beyond.
We need a lower Thames Crossing that properly meets the needs of South Essex and North Kent, that will aid regeneration and employment and facilitate improved connectivity between Essex and Kent.
Then when we have a choice of crossings there will be fair competition and tolls will find their own levels.
